title: Bug 2694 Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions
description:
Bug 2694 Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE). There are several UI suggestions for the Editor Selection Dialog:
a. Enable multiple selection.
c. Mark the default entry in the associated editors list as '(default)' (similar to perspectives).

There are also additional issues:
f. The dialog needs a width hint.
g. The File editors Preference page grows in height when it is selected, unlike other pages.

KLM made some fixes for issues a, c, and f, and the fixes have been released. However, the fix for issue g is still pending.
